get.description: Noyo regularly audits each Group against the carrier(s) that the Group has coverage with in order to find updated data and potential mismatches. This endpoint returns metadata about the latest group audit request that was completed. If no group audits have been completed the `completed_at` timestamp will be the timestamp of when the group was created and the `carrier_ids` array will be empty.

parameters.name: group_id

parameters.name: carrier_id

get.summary: Get Latest Group Audit Request

get.description: Noyo regularly audits each Group against the carrier(s) that the Group has coverage with in order to find updated data and potential mismatches. This endpoint returns metadata about the latest group audit requests that were completed for each carrier. If no group audits have been completed the `completed_at` timestamp will be the timestamp of when the group was created and the `carrier_ids` array will be empty.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the associated group in Noyo
parameters.name: group_id

parameters.description: The relative date on which to view the state of the record
